Comment: Tachykinin expression was observed by in situ hybridization and immunostaining (Winther et al.
Adult protocerebral LPP2 tachykinin neur.SuperCategory: Adult tachykinin neuron of the central nervous system
Adult protocerebral LPP2 tachykinin neur.Definition: Adult neuron that expresses tachykinin (FBgn0037976), whose cell body is located in the lateral posterior protocerebrum and that innervates the superior median protocerebrum and the fan-shaped body. One cluster of around 10 cell bodies is found per hemisphere (Winther et al., 2003).
